column1: depcalm,600,"It is also very useful in anxiety, apathy, sleep disturbances, insomnia, anorexia, and feeling of worthlessness.Also, it may help to induce a feeling of calm, diminishes over sensitivity, improves mood, enhance well being and sociability, relieves pain, fatigue and also improve mental alertness.",30,https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/ayurveda-d6cac.appspot.com/o/1652441465622_depcalm.jpg?alt=media&token=image,"depcalm,depression,anxiety,tention,chinta,preshani,pressure,","Avoid coffee sugar alcohol and dairy products, Avoid any processed food artificial colours stimulant food canned foods eggs meats and fish, Limit your total daily fat intake to 30 % of your total calories, Try not to consume more than 300 milligrams of cholesterol a day","Each 300 mg Capsule Contains

calmhills,275,"Calmhills is an Ayurvedic formulation of Ashwagandha, Brahmi, Shankhpushpi, Jatamansi, Mandukparnee, Ajwain, Pippali. This supplement exerts antistress, neuroprotective and analgesic properties",70,https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/ayurveda-d6cac.appspot.com/o/1652441414779_calmhills.jpg?alt=media&token=image,"calmhills,depression,anxiety,tention,chinta,preshani,pressure","Store Calshell Tablet in a cool and dry place, protected from direct sunlight moisture and heat , Keep it away from children and pets, You should not take Calshell Tablet if you are allergic to any of the components of this supplement, You are suffering from tissue calcification (deposit of calcium in body tissues), You are suffering from malabsorption or have high levels of cholesterol, You are taking any other product containing vitamin D or calcium, You have problems with your heart kidney or liver, You have any existing medical conditions such as diabetes hypertension cancer or any other diseases, You are on other medications supplements or following any complementary or integrative health approaches, You have any planned surgery or operation, You may be asked to stop taking these products at least 2-3 weeks ahead of the procedure, Do not take Calshell Tablet if you have a high level of calcium or vitamin D in the blood a high level of calcium in urine kidney stones or are bedridden, Never take thyroid medicines and this tablet together, You should avoid consuming too much alcohol, You should avoid driving if you do not feel well or are unable to be alert","Calshell Tablet contains calcium and vitamin D3 (also known as cholecalciferol/colecalciferol), ","Calshell Tablet should be taken as advised by the doctor or pharmacist, Take it preferably after the evening meal, Do not consume it more than that easecalm,550,"*Eascalm Tablet* helps in Anxiety & Depression sleep. Promotes normal functioning of nervous system. Acts as brain tonic, stress reliever and mild sedative. Relieves mind and promotes sleep.",150,https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/ayurveda-d6cac.appspot.com/o/1652441486839_EASECALM.jpeg?alt=media&token=image,"easecalm,depression,anxiety,tention,chinta,preshani,pressure","It shouldn?t be used in children, Don?t take a dose that?s higher than what your doctor prescribed Higher doses increase your risk of extreme drowsiness, Your total dosage shouldn?t be more than 2 mg once per day taken right before bedtime, You shouldn?t take eszopiclone unless you?re able to stay in bed and have a full night?s sleep (7 to 8 hours) before you must be awake again. Also, you should take this drug right before you get in bed, You shouldn?t take it any sooner,Call your doctor right away if you have any suicidal thoughts (thoughts of harming yourself) while taking this drug",Antipsychotics such as haloperidol fluphenazine and olanzapine,"Adult dosage (ages 18 to 64 years) 1 mg once per day taken right before bedtime

obis-30 capsule,95,OBIS 30 CAPSULE by ALOPA HERBAL is an ayurvedic proprietary medicine for obesity. Obesity is a burning issue and people are eager for the best medicine to help with. It increases fat metabolism and helps to have an optimum lipid level in the body. cardicare SGC,625,Cardicare SGC keeps the heart healthy by increasing ATP production in cardiac muscles and protects it by modulating oxidative stress and inflammatory response.,90,https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/ayurveda-d6cac.appspot.com/o/1652441723708_cardicare-sgc.jpg?alt=media&token=image,"cardicare SGC,chest pain,chat me dard,sina dard ","Reduce your intake of all types of meat, dairy products, processed food contains high levels of salt sugar and fat, Smoking constricts your arteries, makes your blood sticky and more likely to form a clot, robs your body of vitamins and costs you a small fortune. So quit smoking for a healthy heart, Don?t skip your check-ups. There are silent heart risk factors that are harder to detect on your own so it is important to regularly get checked out by a doctor, Avoid Sitting for Hours- Even if you exercise regularly, sitting for long periods of time can put you at risk for heart disease and stroke, Don?t Neglect Dental Care - Studies are revealing that your teeth and gums are a telling sign of your heart health, New research shows that gum disease causes bacteria that can lead to inflammation in the body. So be sure to brush your teeth and floss, Excess in Alcohol Consumption - small amounts of alcohol may be good for the heart but alcohol in excess having more than two drinks per day puts you at greater risk of high blood pressure high levels of blood fats and heart failure, Having type II diabetes puts you at greater risk for heart disease Well-controlled blood sugar and insulin levels are key to managing the disease and keeping heart disease at bay (Two times in men and three times in women.)","Grape Seed, Omega-3 FA (EPA/DHA 80:20), Co-Q10 (Ubiquinone), Resveratrol",1-2 capsules to be taken twice daily after meals as a dietary supplements or as directed by your physician,627cae4b412fc0e68820c48f,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

Shallaki Extract Capsules-,35,Himalaya Shallaki Tablet is used as a supplement for patients with bone and joint disorders to ease the symptoms. It also prevents cell damage and reduces the inflammation of the joints.,89,https://firebasestorage.googleapis.com/v0/b/ayurveda-d6cac.appspot.com/o/1652442219067_Shallaki Extract Capsules-.jpg?alt=media&token=image,Shallaki Extract Capsules-,joint pain,jodo ka dard","Let your doctor know if you have any liver, kidney or heart problems, allergic reactions to medicines or a surgery scheduled before starting this supplement, Inform your doctor in advance if you are pregnant, planning to conceive or breastfeeding before starting the medication, If you feel dizzy/sleepy while using this medicine, it is advised to avoid driving and operating machinery until you feel better, Limit or avoid alcohol intake while using this medicine to minimize interactions and occurrence of side effects, Keep the medicine out of reach of children and pets Store in a cool dry place protected from moisture heat and direct sunlight","To be taken under medical supervision, Read the Label carefully before use, Store in a cool and dry place, away from sunlight, Keep out of the reach of children", 1-2 capsules once or twice a day,"627cadc6412fc0e68820c487
